instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7090: What is U7090? This chip is often responsible for creating PP3V42_G3H.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.Q7180: What is Q7180? Inrush limiter transistor that must be told by the ISL6259 that it is safe to allow charger voltage to pass through to the computer. This needs CHGR_AGATE and CHGR_SGATE to be pulled down in order for it to close and allow voltage through to the system, current sensing failures as well as ISL6259 failures can cause this to happen. .
definitions.SYS_ONEWIRE: What is SYS_ONEWIRE? This is a bidirectional communication line between the system management controller(SMC) and the charger that allows the charger to communicate with the SMC. This must be working for the light to come on on the magsafe charger. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> magsafe green light goes out after a while
threads.message:
board was liquid damaged and corrosion was found on <CHIP>U7090</CHIP>, <TRANSISTOR>Q7180</TRANSISTOR>, <TRANSISTOR>Q7130</TRANSISTOR>, <TRANSISTOR>Q7155</TRANSISTOR>. I've replaced all these corroded parts.
J9500's pin 19,21 was corroded. I've already replaced this connector.

after fully charged the battery, when the light goes green then after approx 30min the green light goes out.
when i re-plug the magsafe the green light sometime goes out instantly.


i've already tried another known good magsafe board+cable, trackpad+flex cable, battery.

using a original magsafe 2 85w charger.

ISL:
resistance between:
27/28: 20 ohms
16/17: 3.2 ohms

<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL>: 8.57v
PP3v42: 3.4v


[media=youtube]EVARhCwU4Hk[/media]


bad isl and smc??

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> magsafe green light goes out after a while
threads.message:
"i've already tried another known good magsafe board+cable"
Do you mean known good LIO board and flex?

Monitor <SIGNAL>SYS_ONEWIRE</SIGNAL> signal on MLB, when the light goes off.

Light goes off (or flickers) only when battery is fully charged (100%)?
Did you try known good battery (even old)?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> magsafe green light goes out after a while
threads.message:
seem to have fixed itself after been through USC.

i'll test the laptop for a couple of days.

thanks
